attributes.action: reinstate Mrs Sarah Arrow's membership on Ecademy.com
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ecademy's decision to suspend Sarah's membership without a viable explanation has stunned all members. This brings into question whether certain people can use the Internet to abuse others' right to express themselves freely. This case is about transparency on the Internet highlighted by the damaged Ecademy's incredible efforts to undermine entrepreneurs's ability to exchange ideas freely.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
